## Introduction


Download the packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(tibble)
```


```{r}
library(readxl)
readxl::excel_sheets('1-s2.0-S0092867420307431-mmc6.xlsx')
a = read_excel('1-s2.0-S0092867420307431-mmc6.xlsx', sheet=2, col_names=TRUE)
```

Prepare and rearrange the data
```{r}
a <-t(a)
colnames(a)<-a[1,]
a <- a[-1,]
colnames(a)<-gsub(" ","_",colnames(a))
b <-as.data.frame(a[5:87,80:2948],drop=false)
y <- cbind(ID = rownames(b),b)
rownames(y)<-NULL
```

```{r}
b.long <- pivot_longer(y,cols=-1, names_to="Protein", values_to="P_Values")
```


```{r}
b.long %>% ggplot(aes(x=Protein, y=ID, fill=P_Values)) + geom_tile() + xlab(label="ID")
```
